Name: Bowling
About the game: Grab your best bowling shoes and get ready to play this fun and easy to play bowling game anytime. The aim of the game is to score points by knocking down the pins, just line up your shot by choosing the position, power and direction of your ball. Play against a friend or play against the computer’s smart artificial intelligence (AI) player, either way, winning won’t come easy. Just remember its precision and power that gets the best score and wins the game.
